about_the_game:
High Tech Low Life is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by
classic Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue
choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in
third person firefights with challenging enemies.

When a newly trained special agent, a street kid, an unhinged leader
of a sleeper cell and it's enforcer. Find themselves entangled with
gang members, drug smugglers and drive traffickers.
Some of the most detestable individuals; the inhabitants of the Cardinal District.
The fate of their lives all come to a head.

High Tech Low Life for PC offers players the option to explore various
areas in and around the City of Solstice in resolutions up to 4K.

Features:
• Real time lipsync facial animation.
• A unique single player Cyberpunk walk and talk game with deep narrative.
• Featuring multi layered branched dialogue choice.
• Game design focusing on player immersion and close quarters combat.
• All dialogue features professional voice acting.

***Pre-Alpha game footage & UI - does not represent the final version***

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content

name: High Tech Low Life®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 2300 / AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 650 TI, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Over time downloadable content and programming changes will change the system requirements for this game. Please refer to your hardware manufacturer.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5 8400 / AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce® GTX 780, 3 GB / AMD Radeon R9 290X, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Over time downloadable content and programming changes will change the system requirements for this game. Please refer to your hardware manufacturer.

short_description: High Tech Low Life® is a third-person action-adventure game, set in a world inspired by classic Cyberpunk Japanese Manga. Explore districts, with branched dialogue choice, walk and talk, shoot and talk, active reload, slow time and engage in third person firefights with challenging enemies.
